title: Update Failed. >_<
body: It says Unspecified error occured. Please check the logs for more information. I'm new in the league please halp.

replies.body: Same here, and it crashes instantly on launch
Out of curiosity, are there any modifications made to play in a language not supported by your region?
My game is in English in EUW and it worked well until I tried to download the new client
To get a better understanding of what's going on, at what % during the patcher is the error happening?  Let me know, so you can get your feet wet on the rift!
It does it at just 2% for me

Have an unspecified at 2% usually indicates a security setting issue with your PC, and it's blocking your patcher from scanning game files.  Use the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to get this fixed up!  Hope this helps.
